item.text: For freedom Christ has set us free. Stand firm, then, and do not be subject again to the yoke of slavery.

<st data-num="2396" class="">Listen</st>! <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st>, <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you let yourselves be <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcised</st>, <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> will <st data-num="5623" class="">be</st> of <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5623" class="">benefit</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> at all!

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="3143" class="">testify</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> who lets himself be <st data-num="4059" class="">circumcised</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3781" class="">obligated</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">obey</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.

You <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> are trying to be <st data-num="1344">declared righteous</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> have been <st data-num="2673" class="">alienated</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ;</st> you have <st data-num="1601">fallen away</st> from <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st>!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> through the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>, <st data-num="1473">we</st> <st data-num="553">wait expectantly for</st> the <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> of <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>.
For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision carries any weight—the only thing that matters is faith working through love.
You were running well; who prevented you from obeying the truth?

This <st data-num="3988" class="">persuasion</st><n id="1" /> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> come <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the one who <st data-num="2564" class="">calls</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!

A <st data-num="3398" class="">little</st> <st data-num="2219" class="">yeast</st> makes the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="5445" class="">batch of dough</st> <st data-num="2220" class="">rise</st>!<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="3982" class="">confident</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you will <st data-num="5426" class="">accept</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> view.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the one who is <st data-num="5015" class="">confusing</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will <st data-num="941" class="">pay</st> the <st data-num="2917" class="">penalty</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3748" class="">whoever</st> he may <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I am <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="2784" class="">preaching</st> <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> am I <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> being <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuted</st>?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="686">In that case</st> the <st data-num="4625" class="">offense</st> of the <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st><n id="3" /> has been <st data-num="2673" class="">removed</st>.<n id="4" />
I wish those agitators would go so far as to castrate themselves!
For you were called to freedom, brothers and sisters; only do not use your freedom as an opportunity to indulge your flesh, but through love serve one another.
For the whole law can be summed up in a single commandment, namely, “You must love your neighbor as yourself.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">However</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you continually <st data-num="1143" class="">bite</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2719" class="">devour</st> <st data-num="240" class="">one another</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="991" class="">beware</st> that you are <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="355" class="">consumed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, <st data-num="4043" class="">live</st><n id="1" /> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="3756 3361">not</st> <st data-num="5055">carry out</st> the <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st> of the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> has <st data-num="1937" class="">desires</st> that are <st data-num="2596" class="">opposed</st> to the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> has desires<n id="1" /> that are <st data-num="2596" class="">opposed</st> to the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> are in <st data-num="480" class="">opposition</st> to<n id="2" /> <st data-num="240">each other</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you <st data-num="3361" class="">cannot</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="71" class="">led</st> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> of the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st><n id="1" /> are <st data-num="5318" class="">obvious:</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st>, <st data-num="167" class="">impurity</st>, <st data-num="766" class="">depravity</st>,

<st data-num="1495" class="">idolatry</st>, <st data-num="5331" class="">sorcery</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2189" class="">hostilities</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2054" class="">strife</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2205" class="">jealousy</st>, <st data-num="2372">outbursts of anger</st>, <st data-num="2052">selfish rivalries</st>, <st data-num="1370" class="">dissensions</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="139" class="">factions</st>,
envying, murder, drunkenness, carousing, and similar things. I am warning you, as I had warned you before: Those who practice such things will not inherit the kingdom of God!
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,

<st data-num="4240" class="">gentleness</st>, and<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1466" class="">self-control</st>. <st data-num="2596" class="">Against</st> <st data-num="5108">such things</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> those who belong to <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> have <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> its <st data-num="3804" class="">passions</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st>.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> we <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, let us <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4748">behave in accordance with</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.
Let us not become conceited, provoking one another, being jealous of one another.
